Welcome to the city! I'd be happy to help you navigate the public transportation system.

Based on your preferences, I'll provide you with a suggested route to get to 123 Main St. from your apartment. Since you're new to the city, I'll also give you some general tips and information to help you feel more comfortable using the public transportation system.

**Route Suggestion:**

1. From your apartment, walk to the nearest bus stop that serves the **Bus Route 12**. You can use a transit app like Moovit or Transit to find the closest stop. Bus Route 12 should take you to the **Central Station**, which is a major transportation hub in the city.
2. At Central Station, transfer to the **Red Line Train** (Direction: Downtown). The train ride should take around 20-25 minutes.
3. Get off at the **Main Street Station**, which is just a 2-minute walk to 123 Main St.

**Tips and Information:**

* You can use the city's transit website or a transit app to plan your route and get real-time information. These resources can help you find the closest bus stops, train schedules, and even track your journey in real-time.
* Make sure to check the bus and train schedules in advance to plan your trip accordingly. You can also set up notifications to remind you when it's time to leave.
* The city's public transportation system operates from around 5:00 AM to 12:30 AM, Monday through Saturday, and 6:00 AM to 12:30 AM on Sundays. Keep this in mind when planning your trip.
* You can pay for your fare using cash, credit/debit cards, or mobile payments like Apple Pay or Google Pay.
* If you're unsure about anything during your journey, don't hesitate to ask fellow passengers or transit staff for help. They're usually very friendly and willing to assist.

**Additional Tips for New Residents:**

* Consider purchasing a reusable transit card or a monthly pass to save money and make your commutes more convenient.
* Take some time to explore the city's neighborhoods and attractions using public transportation. You might discover new hidden gems and favorite spots!
* Be mindful of peak hours (usually 7-9 AM and 4-6 PM) when commuting, as buses and trains might be more crowded.

I hope this helps you plan your trip to 123 Main St. and gets you comfortable with using the public transportation system in the city. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
